languages.text: {n}Медикарий пытается одной рукой пригладить волосы, а второй — поправить воротник.{/n} "Н-но как же, как не с помазанни{mf|ком|цей} Императора? Видение... я должен просить об этом только вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Медикарий пытается одной рукой пригладить волосы, а второй — поправить воротник.{/n} "Н-но как же, как не с помазанни{mf|ком|цей} Императора? Видение... я должен просить об этом только вас".

languages.text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."
languages.original_text: {n}Медикарий пытается одной рукой пригладить волосы, а второй — поправить воротник.{/n} "Н-но как же, как не с помазанни{mf|ком|цей} Императора? Видение... я должен просить об этом только вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}The medicae officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must petition you about it. It can only be you."

{n}The medicae officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must petition you about it. It can only be you."

{n}The medicae officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

{n}The medicae officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

{n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

{n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

languages.text: {n}L'officier tente de se lisser les cheveux d'une main tout en arrangeant son col de l'autre.{/n} « M-mais à qui dois-je m'adresser, si ce n'est à l'{mf|un des représentants consacrés|une des représentantes consacrées} de l'Empereur ? La vision... Je devais absolument vous en informer. Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez m'accorder votre permission. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier tente de se lisser les cheveux d'une main tout en arrangeant son col de l'autre.{/n} « M-mais à qui dois-je m'adresser, si ce n'est à l'{mf|un des représentants consacrés|une des représentantes consacrées} de l'Empereur ? La vision... Je devais absolument vous en informer. Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez m'accorder votre permission. »

languages.text: {n}El oficial se atusa el pelo con una mano y se ajusta el cuello del uniforme con la otra.{/n} «Pe... pero con quién iba a hablar, si no con {mf|uno|una} de los ungidos del Emperador? La visión... debo poner este asunto en su conocimiento. Es usted {mf|el único|la única} a quien puedo acudir».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial se atusa el pelo con una mano y se ajusta el cuello del uniforme con la otra.{/n} «Pe... pero con quién iba a hablar, si no con {mf|uno|una} de los ungidos del Emperador? La visión... debo poner este asunto en su conocimiento. Es usted {mf|el único|la única} a quien puedo acudir».

languages.text: {n}眼前的军官试着用一只手抚平头发，另一只手扯紧了衣领。{/n}“可如果不找帝皇的神选者谈这件事情，还能找谁谈呢？我看到的景象……我必须和您谈谈这件事请，您是我唯一能请求的人了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的军官试着用一只手抚平头发，另一只手扯紧了衣领。{/n}“可如果不找帝皇的神选者谈这件事情，还能找谁谈呢？我看到的景象……我必须和您谈谈这件事请，您是我唯一能请求的人了。”

languages.text: {n}士官は片手で髪を直し、もう一方の手で襟を直した。{/n}「しかし、皇帝の関連者でなければ、他に誰が？あの幻覚…これはあなたに知らせなければいけない問題です。あなたにしか頼めません」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官は片手で髪を直し、もう一方の手で襟を直した。{/n}「しかし、皇帝の関連者でなければ、他に誰が？あの幻覚…これはあなたに知らせなければいけない問題です。あなたにしか頼めません」

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier versucht, sich mit einer Hand die Haare zu glätten und mit der anderen seinen Kragen zu richten.{/n} "A-Aber wer sonst, wenn nicht jemand, der vom Imperator gesalbt wurde? Die Vision ... Ich muss Euch auf diese Angelegenheit aufmerksam machen. Ihr seid {mf|der Einzige, den|die Einzige, die} ich fragen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier versucht, sich mit einer Hand die Haare zu glätten und mit der anderen seinen Kragen zu richten.{/n} "A-Aber wer sonst, wenn nicht jemand, der vom Imperator gesalbt wurde? Die Vision ... Ich muss Euch auf diese Angelegenheit aufmerksam machen. Ihr seid {mf|der Einzige, den|die Einzige, die} ich fragen kann."

languages.text: {n}Subay tek eliyle saçlarını, diğer eliyle yakasını düzeltmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "A... Ama İmparator'un kutsadığıyla konuşmazsam kiminle konuşacağım? Görü... Bu konuyu sizin dikkatinize sunmalıydım. Sorabileceğim tek kişi sizsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tries to smooth his hair with one hand and straighten his collar with the other.{/n} "B-but who else if not one of the Emperor's anointed? The vision... I must bring this matter to your attention. You are the only one I can ask."
